item.title: RMarkdown template from my reference blog
item.description: I stumbled into a niche YouTube genre: Web Development online instructors (a.k.a content creators) challenge each other to “CSS Battles”. Turns out they are fascinating videos where experienced programmers talk and fumble their way through their coding. As they talked through their thought processes, I thought about the questions we ask when our code goes wrong and the answers we get when we reprex. CSS Battle with The CSS King I challenged The CSS King to a CSS Battle on YouTube I’ve thought a lot about this video since I watched it.
